name: Proto Sum
description:
Invited to a place beneath the earth known only as the Facility, you are asked to debug a prototype AI - but not told what it will be used for. What will you teach it? The future may ride on your choices.

---

Thanks for coming to check out my game! Proto Sum is in beta, so if you've got any feedback or notice any bugs, please share them! Because it is in beta, the clicker-game difficulty has been set to very easy.

This game is a submission for the Twine Survival Guide Jam. While it is built to run responsively on mobiles/tablets, it has not been bug-tested yet.

Potential Future Updates:

  • Scale difficulty in clicker game
  • Add more dialogue
  • Add music
  • Improve styling / text in clicker game & event buttons.
  • Add more facial expressions.

Known Bugs:

  • Occasionally when you click on a button in the programming game, it won't register, so you've got to click twice. This is due to the refresh hack used to create a "live" environment using Twine.

Thanks again for checking this out!

Made with Sugarcube and Tweego.
